about_the_game:
In this FPS Roguelike, you'll be fighting enemies and bosses with distinctive behaviors while traversing through a procedurally generated Aztecan temple. Finding game-changing weapon upgrade synergies and learning how to hastily maneuver through the temple will be key if you want to survive.

Build Up Your Weapons With Synergistic Upgrades



Avanzar is an FPS Roguelike that handles weapon upgrades like no other. Want to shoot homing bees instead of bullets? You got it! Want to put those bees on fire? Why not!

How about a gatling gun that briefly gains infinite ammo after each kill? We've got you covered. Gain nearly limitless possibilities by combining any weapon upgrades you want.

Advanced Movement Mechanics



Wall run, slide, sprint, and bunnyhop your way through the temple at breakneck speed! Earn greater rewards by quickly navigating through treasure rooms.

Take on Unique Enemies and Bosses



The gang's all here 🐸🐢🐊🐍🍞🐕🕷🦇

name: Avanzar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Avanzar is a fast-paced FPS Roguelike set in an ancient Aztecan temple. Reach the heart of the ever-changing temple by stacking up synergistic weapon upgrades and mastering the advanced movement mechanics while overcoming the guardians of the temple.
